title: Generate Button for AI Acceptance Tests in Create Child Story Modal
description: Add a Generate button to the Create Child Story modal that triggers AI analysis of the story content to automatically create acceptance tests in Given-When-Then format. The generated tests should appear in an editable Acceptance Tests field below the existing modal content.
iWant: to click Generate button in Create Child Story modal and have AI automatically create acceptance tests
soThat: I can generate structured acceptance tests without manual writing

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am in the Create Child Story modal with story content filled
acceptanceCriteria.then: AI analyzes the story content and generates relevant acceptance tests in Given-When-Then format
a new Acceptance Tests field appears below the existing modal content displaying the generated tests

acceptanceCriteria.given: the Acceptance Tests field is displayed
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can edit the tests before saving the story
